Out of the Cities 

                 "St. Helena, Cal., October 13, 1902. 


     "During my stay in Southern California, I was enabled to visit places that in the past have been presented to me by the Lord as suitable for the establishment of sanitariums and schools. For years I have been given special light that we are not to establish large centers for our work in the cities. The turmoil and confusion that fills these 


                                               11 

cities, the conditions brought about by the labor unions and the strikes, would prove a great hindrance to our work.
